<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=335) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 137 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements. Add the forms in [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list. Whenever you’re polymorphed into another form using _wild shape_, you gain resistance 5 to fire.

<title level="2">Elemental Shape leads to...</title>
[Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1718)
name: Elemental Shape
